mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Expense (warehouse_id, type, cost, expense_date) VALUES (#{warehouseId}, #{type}, #{cost}, #{expenseDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE Expense SET type = #{type}, expense_date = #{expenseDate}, cost = #{cost} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(expense_date) AS expense_month, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM Expense WHERE warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} AND YEAR(expense_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(expense_date) ORDER BY expense_month;
